title: What is the current most advanced technology and how will it affect our lives? - Quora

response.answer_text: We have to look at a combination of technologies: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML) and the growing awareness of the Computational Power of Quantum Machines / Processors. Like how electricity flows through a city, a country and a Network of continents, we now have a stream of Data that requires processing and we need to understand how that Data can be used to provide Value. The enablers will be AI / ML coupled with a Quantum foundation. I would say Brain Computer Inter face Technology. The ability to turn thoughts to action seems like sci fi. Yet it happening. Let take a look at what you can do: Transfer thoughts to words and “type”Receive information via broadcast; think telepathyMonitor entire body healthLink to other hardware and use thoughts to control objects. Like a handicap person now able to control exo skeleton through thought.Thats just for starters. When you combine this with Augmented Reality and Machine Learning AI were are going to be living in a whole new world!
